title: Resilient
content:
onstitution) checks + Hit Points equal to your level. Keep in mind that you are not already Proficient in Constitution for this to work. Barbarian, Fighter, and Sorcerer already start with proficiency in Constitution Saving Throws. Notes & Tips go here
